articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversaries of Kim Jong Il's Work and Int'l Women's Day
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversaries of Kim Jong Il's Work and Int'l Women's Day
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture Sunday to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Women Are a Dynamic Force Pushing Ahead with the Revolution and Construction" and the 105th anniversary of the March 8 International Women's Day.
					He published the work on Mar. 8, Juche 84 (1995) to formulate scientifically and theoretically the position and role of women in the revolution and construction and comprehensively deal with the issues arising in defending and glorifying the tradition and history of the Korean women's movement and establishing the trait of respecting women throughout the society.
					
					Attending the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, Han Kwang Bok, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), Kim Jong Im, director of the Party History Institute of the C.C., the WPK, officials of working people's organizations and press organs, exemplary women and women officials and members of the women's union in Pyongyang.
					
					Present there on invitation were overseas Korean women and women from foreign embassies and missions of international bodies here.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, made a report.
					
					He said that more than a century since the institution of the March 8 International Women's Day was represented as proud years in which the world progressive women made a dynamic struggle under the slogan of peace, democracy and socialism and a historic course in which international unity and solidarity were boosted among progressive women and big progress was made in the development of the international women's movement.
					
					He referred to the Korean women's movement which has covered the road of shining victory along with the glorious history of the Korean revolution under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					During the hard fought anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, Kim Il Sung made a new history of the Korean women's movement advancing under the banner of the Juche idea to provide its brilliant tradition, the reporter noted, and went on:
					
					Its history is associated with the immortal feats of Kang Pan Sok, outstanding leader of the Korean women's movement, and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk who dedicated themselves to women's emancipation under the guidance of Kim Il Sung. These feats serve as precious treasures for the Korean women's movement.
					
					Kim Jong Il firmly defended and glorified Kim Il Sung's idea of women's movement and leadership exploits, developing the Korean women's movement on a new higher stage.
					
					He made sure that the song "Love Your Wives" was presented to the women across the country on the International Women's Day, convened the national meeting of mothers in period when the country was undergoing difficulties and projected as heroes and patriots the women who are giving birth to many babies and looking after orphans as their real mothers would do.
					
					The Korean women's movement greets the heyday of its development as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					He instituted Mother's Day, the first of its kind in the Korean history, and saw to it that the 4th national meeting of mothers was held with splendor on the occasion of the first mother's day. He spared time to have a picture taken with its participants.
					
					The Korean women's movement has steadily developed into the Juche-oriented one remaining faithful to the idea and cause of the leader and demonstrated its might as an example of the progressive women's movement of the world under the wise guidance of peerlessly great men.
					
					Only victory and glory are always in store for the Korean people and women dashing ahead like snowstorm on Mt. Paektu toward the final victory of Juche-oriented revolution, upholding Kim Jong Un at the helm of the party and the revolution.

articles.title: Congratulatory Performance Given by National Circus
articles.content:
Congratulatory Performance Given by National Circus
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the National Circus at the Pyongyang Circus Theater on Sunday to mark the 105th anniversary of the March 8 International Women's Day.
					 It was appreciated by Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop and other officials concerned, women scientists of meritorious service, exemplary women and labor innovators in Pyongyang, women's union officials and their husbands and children.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas Korean women, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here and their spouses, military attaches and their spouses and foreigners.
					
					 The performers warmly congratulated women greeting the March 8 International Women's Day and gave bouquets to them amid the playing of the song of "Woman Is Flower".
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including ice acrobatics "Youth on Ice" and comedic circus "Cheerleader".
					
					 The performers represented the happiness life of the Korean women in numbers showing peculiar technique and wonderful acrobatic skills.

articles.title: DPRK Acrobats Return Home
articles.content:
DPRK Acrobats Return Home
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK acrobats returned home on Sunday after taking part in the 4th Figueras International Circus Festival.

articles.title: AINDF Calls for Shattering U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' War Moves
articles.content:
AINDF Calls for Shattering U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' War Moves
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Information Bureau of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) released an "appeal to all the people" on March 6 to denounce the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers for their large-scale joint military exercises against the DPRK, according to website Kuguk Jonson.
					 A touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the provocative Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises kicked off by the warmongers, the appeal said.
					
					 The danger of the saber-rattling is increasing as it is being staged at a time when Obama unhesitatingly blustered it is the U.S. policy goal to "bring down" the north, it noted.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is staging the north-targeted nuclear war maneuvers with the aggressor foreign forces by hurling its troops as marionettes and shock brigade of its U.S. master, while slandering the north's nuclear deterrent for self-defence, it said.
					
					 Only merciless punishment should be meted out to the U.S. and its followers keen on the moves for aggression and war, it noted, and went on:
					
					 Let us turn out as one in the decisive resistance against the U.S., the architect of division and root cause of war!
					
					 Let us all turn out in the struggle against the U.S. moves for igniting a nuclear war against the north!
					
					 Let us courageously rise up in the struggle against the present conservative ruing forces keen to escalate the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north while resorting to sycophancy toward the U.S.!
					
					 Let all the people rise up in unity in the actions for peace against war, irrespective of age and sex, occupation, strata, party affiliation and religious belief!
					
					 Let all the people respond to the patriotic sacred war of the north which rose up in the final decisive action to inflict the most dreadful disaster in history on the U.S. mainland, the cesspool of evils, and bring earlier the victory of the great war for national reunification!
					
					 Let us rise up to wipe out the U.S., the root cause of war and the cancer-like entity disturbing peace, and pro-U.S. belligerent forces and build a prosperous reunified powerful country on this land without fail!

articles.title: Blessed DPRK Women
articles.content:
Blessed DPRK Women
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The women in the DPRK are now significantly enjoying the International Women's Day.
					 On this occasion, they recollect the loving care shown by supreme leader Kim Jong Un for them.
					
					 Kim Kum Ok, a marathoner of the April 25 Sports Team, told KCNA:
					
					 "My pride of being a woman grows higher with each passing day.
					
					 The respected Marshal Kim Jong Un made me well-known to the country in praise of my successes in international games. Indeed, he is the tender-hearted father of us, women, as he has taken warm care of our destiny and future."
					
					 Such feelings are running high among other women from all walks of life in the DPRK.
					
					 In fact, Kim Jong Un has done all what he could do for the women in the country.
					
					 On March 8, 2012, he made sure that a celebration performance was given to encourage the DPRK women overcome with deep grief at the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He also saw to it that Mother's Day was instituted and a grand meeting of mothers was held. And under his deep care such hospitals for the women were built as the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.
					
					 Encouraged by such warm love, the DPRK women have turned out in the vigorous drive for building a thriving nation, despite hardships.
					
					 They say it is the greatest fortune and happiness of the DPRK to uphold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as its supreme leader.

articles.title: All Korean Women Called upon to Take Lead in Improving Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
All Korean Women Called upon to Take Lead in Improving Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Women Sub-Committee of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the Women Headquarters of South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration Sunday made public an appeal to all women in the north and south and overseas on the occasion the March 8 International Women's Day.
					 It said that the undesired national division has lasted for seven decades, hurting the hearts of Koreans in the north and the south and inflicting unspeakable misfortune and pain to women before any others else.
					
					 Distrust and confrontation have escalated between compatriots, and sharp military tension and war danger increased so that a war may break out any moment, it noted.
					
					 Calling upon women to usher in the era of reconciliation and cooperation and take the lead in propelling the improvement of the inter-Korean relations, it went on:
					
					 Let the Korean women, who value peace more than any others and devoted themselves to improving the north-south relations and reunification, wage a vigorous struggle to defuse war danger and the movement for peace against war to create peaceful environment!
					
					 They should thoroughly implement the June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration.
					
					 Let the Korean women in the north, south and overseas make every effort for national reconciliation and unity, peace and reunification!
					
					 Let us make sustained efforts to force Japan to redress all its past crimes including sexual slavery in firm solidarity with the people of different circles at home and abroad as well as Asian countries and international bodies and human rights organizations in the world!
					
					 Let all women in the north and the south and overseas join efforts to take the lead in glorifying this significant year marking the 70th anniversary of national liberation as a historic year of achieving national reconciliation and unity and opening a broad avenue to independent reunification!

articles.title: Women's Rights Guaranteed by Law in DPRK
articles.content:
Women's Rights Guaranteed by Law in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The women in the DPRK have been given preferential treatment under the deep care of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government.
					 The DPRK law on protection of women's rights stipulates that the women have equal rights with men in all realms of socio-political life.
					
					 By this law, women are encouraged to take active part in socio-political activities.
					
					 Institutions and organizations and industrial establishments at all levels provide necessary conditions for the women to participate in various fields, including education, culture and public health.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Party and government have granted the women various kinds of special benefits, including the system of paid maternity leave.
					
					 Under the care of the Party and government, the DPRK women are now playing a key role in the work for the wellbeing of families and the development of society.

articles.title: Papers Call on Women to Work Hard for Rosy Future
articles.content:
Papers Call on Women to Work Hard for Rosy Future
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Papers Sunday editorially mark the 105th March 8 International Women's Day. They say the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and people of the DPRK send warm congratulations to the women across the country who are pushing one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot to perform shining feats to always go down in the history of the country.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that there are many women in many countries of the world but no women such as those in the DPRK who are significantly greeting the International Women's Day every year amid blessings of the leader and profound love and encouragement of all people.
					
					 The Korean women are leading a worthwhile life, being blessed by the great sun generation after generation, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is their noble traits to always remain faithful to the idea and guidance of the leader.
					
					 Their tradition of devotedly defending the leader with loyalty is being successfully carried forward in the general advance of the new century of Juche. It is the great pride of the WPK and the people of the DPRK to have such big unit of women revolutionaries who have the noble intention to breathe the same breath with their leader and keep pace with his advance, high awareness to bring a flower into bloom even on a rock if this is desired by the Party and immense loyalty to devote themselves to defending the Party Central Committee.
					
					 The DPRK's history of building socialism records the shining feats of the women who fully displayed their patriotism for the prosperity of the country like men.
					
					 Minju Joson calls on Korean women to demonstrate their heroic spirit to the full in the sacred drive to translate into reality the lifetime intention and desire of the great Generalissimos under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Discrimination against Women Workers Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Discrimination against Women Workers Protested in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Women workers under the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a press conference in Seoul on March 5 demanding the lifting of the discrimination against women workers.
					 Speakers said at the press conference that more than 100 years had passed since the women workers waged actions in demand of their rights but discrimination is still going on.
					
					 They said:
					
					 Though their co-worker died due to labour accident, women workers were not allowed to bid farewell to her and were forced to do hard labor for a meager wages. 
					
					 The same is the fate of those women having regular jobs.
					
					 They vowed to carry on their actions till they will be able to live as human beings.

articles.title: Stop to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Called for by Japanese
articles.content:
Stop to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Called for by Japanese
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Takashi Nada, representative of the Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan, on Feb. 19 posted an article on his website denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean authorities for their moves of aggression against the DPRK.
					 Revealing the aggressive nature and danger of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle annually kicked up by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities, the article noted:
					
					 In January this year the staff of the U.S.-south Korea joint division went into full operation.
					
					 Its aim is to bring down the DPRK through special operations.
					
					 It has been involved in the on-going joint military drills.
					
					 Military drills have been staged by the U.S. on the Korean peninsula since long before the DPRK did not have access to nukes.
					
					 "Peace and stability on the peninsula" touted by the U.S. means "unification" after toppling the DPRK.
					
					 The on-going military drills should be halted.

articles.title: Dangerous Nuclear War Drills Denounced by Organization of Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Dangerous Nuclear War Drills Denounced by Organization of Koreans in Russia
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Ri Chae Son, vice-chairwoman of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, issued a statement on March 4 denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces for staging dangerous nuclear war drills against the DPRK.
					 The statement said that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean military warmongers kicked up the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises despite the strong protest and denunciation by the entire Korean nation and the world peace-loving people.
					
					 They are describing the exercises as "annual" and "defensive" ones but this is nothing but a smokescreen to cover up their aggressive nature, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The situation clearly shows that the U.S. and the south Korean puppets are the arch criminals escalating the tension and disturbing peace on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 If the warmongers ignite the war against the north, the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army will wipe out the aggressors.
					
					 The statement urged the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers to stop the dangerous drills for a nuclear war against the north at once, though belatedly.

articles.title: Koreans in China Accuse U.S., S. Korean Forces of Their Saber-Rattling
articles.content:
Koreans in China Accuse U.S., S. Korean Forces of Their Saber-Rattling
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Korean National Economic Workers in China in a statement issued on March 4 slashed out at the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet war-like forces for kicking off Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises across south Korea from March 2 despite strong protest and denunciation of the public at home and abroad.
					 If they drop even a single shell on the land of the DPRK, they will be doomed to be forlorn wandering spirits in face of the powerful striking means of its revolutionary armed forces, the statement warned, adding:
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK do not make an empty talk.
					
					 We will turn out as one in the sacred struggle to defend the country together with the people in motherland, full of confidence that we would surely achieve the final victory as long as Marshal Kim Jong Un, illustrious commander, is leading the van of the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Beninese Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Beninese Political Party Leader
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The august name of the great President Kim Il Sung represents the sun. Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said this at an inaugural ceremony of the preparatory committee of the party for celebrating the 103rd birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung held on March 3.
					 He noted in his speech that the President clearly indicated the road to be taken by the Korean people and other progressive peoples by founding the Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The august name of the President is shining as a symbol of noble virtue and sense of obligation.
					
					 When the Juche idea and the Songun idea are likened to rays of the sun indicating the road to be taken by humankind, his noble virtue and sense of obligation can be likened to the solar heat that brings life to all creatures.
					
					 He was a true friend and great benefactor of the peoples of developing countries as he didn't spare assistance of all forms to the peoples of various countries which were facing difficulties in their efforts to build new society.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Benin
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Benin
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Socialist Party of Benin for celebrating the 103rd birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was formed in Cotonou on March 3.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the party, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to widely introduce and disseminate the life and exploits of Kim Il Sung and hold diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Internet Homepage for News of Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities Opened in Germany
articles.content:
Internet Homepage for News of Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities Opened in Germany
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany opened the Internet homepage "News of Field Guidance" on March 3 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 That day a notice saying "This homepage will report the news of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's field guidance from today" was posted on the homepage, illustrated with a photo of Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un guiding a drill of a KPA unit.
					
					 The homepage, for its inaugural news, reported that the supreme commander inspected Unit 447 of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment and planted trees with fighter pilots of the unit, accompanied with 15 photos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Brazilian Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Brazilian Body on Its Website
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let the Entire Party, the Whole Army and All the People Conduct a Vigorous Forest Restoration Campaign to Cover the Mountains of the Country with Green Woods" was posted by the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on its website on Mar. 2.
					 The work, published on Feb. 26, Juche 104 (2015), says that forest restoration is a challenging and complicated undertaking and that it is a gigantic nature-remaking project to turn all the mountains of the country into "treasure mountains" and "gold mountains." 
					
					 The work also indicates the tasks and ways for creating and conserving forests. 
					
					 The website also carried his photo.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Switzerland
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Switzerland
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated with due ceremony in Basel on March 1.
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 A statement regarding its formation was adopted at the ceremony.
					
					 According to it, the preparatory committee decided to give wide publicity to works and exploits of the President and arrange diverse events including meetings, seminar on his exploits and film show from March 10 to April 16.

articles.title: CRPP condena acto pronorteamericano de banda titere surcoreana
articles.content:
CRPP condena acto pronorteamericano de banda titere surcoreana
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Segun trascendidos, el embajador de Estados Unidos  acreditado en el Sur de Corea, Mark Report fue castigado en el lugar centrico de Seul por un civil surcoreano.
					En el pasado, hubo la lucha violenta antiyanqui tales como el incendio del instituto  cultural norteamericano en Pusan, la explosion del instituto cultural norteamericana en Taegu y el asalto de la embajada norteamericana en Seul. Pero, es la primera vez que el embajador norteamericano, gobernador general colonial en el terreno recibio  el sablazo de indignacion.
					
					Al respecto, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 7 la informacion no. 1085.
					
					La nota senala que el presente incidente ha sido el reflejo de la opinion publica y la expresion de resistencia de los habitantes surcoreanos a EE.UU. que agrava la crisis de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana desarrollando en el suelo surcoreano el peligroso entrenamiento militar conjunto.
					
					El problema consiste en que la banda titere surcoreana se desespera por ligar este incidente con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea calificandolo de "conducta de las fuerzas pro-Norte de Corea" subraya y continua:
					
					En relacion con que lo publicamos como castigo de justicia y la resistencia de la opinion publica a EE.UU., la banda titere nos acuso perversamente disparatando que es la "proteccion al terrorismo", la "tergiversacion de la esencia del incidente" y la "palabra insensata que reconoce que ella misma es el grupo terrorista anti-DDHH".
					
					Y hasta, los policias y los medios de prensa conservadores se suman a esta locura diciendo que el protagonista de este incidente visito antes el Norte de Corea que le abrigo activamente cuando el tiro el ladrillo al embajador japones en el Sur de Corea.
					
					E insatisfechos con esto lanzaron a los viejos conservadores ultraderechistas a insultar la maxima dignidad y la bandera de la RPDC creando asi el ambiente horroroso.
					
					Todo esto parte de la  maligna intencion de evitar la verguenza internacional sufrida por este incidente, desviando la atencion publica, exterminar en esta ocasion a las fuerzas patrioticas por la reunificacion y recurrir mas al alboroto internacional anti-RPDC.
					
					Sobre todo, aprovechando el presente caso persiguen instigar a EE.UU. para que determine de nuevo la RPDC  como "pais patrocinador del terrorismo" y fortalecer mas el contubernio con su amo gringo y la cooperacion internacional anti-RPDC.
					
					Tratar como criminal a su ciudadano que expresa resistencia a EE.UU. que desarrolla con frenesi los ejercicios militares conjuntos significa revelar mas la naturaleza de los traidores especiales pronorteamericanos.
